00001.name: Dr. Kok Tim Ming
00001.qualifications: PhD in Clinical Psychology, Licensed Therapist
00001.bio: Dr. Kok specializes in trauma recovery and CBT, working with patients suffering from PTSD and chronic anxiety.
00001.treatmentApproach: Focused on evidence-based practices including CBT and exposure therapy for anxiety and trauma recovery

00002.name: Dr. Thian Ren Ning
00002.bio: Dr. Thian is a psychiatrist with extensive experience in treating mood disorders like depression and bipolar disorder.
00002.treatmentApproach: Utilizes a combination of medication and psychotherapy for mood stabilization and patient wellness

00003.name: Dr. Chai Wai Jin
00003.qualifications: MSc in Counseling Psychology, Licensed Counselor
00003.bio: Dr. Chai is an expert in stress management, employing mindfulness-based interventions for anxiety and stress.
00003.treatmentApproach: Incorporates mindfulness and relaxation techniques for reducing anxiety and improving overall mental health

00004.name: Dr. Lim Yi Xuan
00004.qualifications: PhD in Psychology, Cognitive Behavioral Specialist
00004.bio: Dr. Lim focuses on treating depression and anxiety through cognitive behavioral interventions.
00004.treatmentApproach: Emphasizes structured therapy sessions focused on reshaping negative thought patterns

00005.name: Dr. Takumi Kotobuki
00005.bio: Dr. Takumi is a psychiatrist specializing in the medical management of severe mental illnesses like schizophrenia.
00005.treatmentApproach: Integrates medication management with supportive psychotherapy for patients with chronic conditions

00006.name: Dr. Thian Ren Ning
00006.bio: Dr. Thian is a psychiatrist with extensive experience in treating mood disorders like depression and bipolar disorder.
00006.treatmentApproach: Utilizes a combination of medication and psychotherapy for mood stabilization and patient wellness
